name: NSOpenGLGlobalOption
desc: Constants that specify OpenGL options.DeprecatedThe OpenGL API is deprecated. Use Metal and MetalKit instead.

items.name: case formatCacheSize
items.desc: Sets the size of the pixel format cache.

items.name: case clearFormatCache
items.desc: Resets the pixel format cache if true.

items.name: case retainRenderers
items.desc: Whether to retain loaded renderers in memory.

items.name: case useBuildCache
items.desc: Whether to enable the function compilation block cache. This is off by default. It must be enabled at startup.
